entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lutselke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 31.
